Title(s): Northern Homily Cycle; ‘De miraculis in purificacione’
Subjects: Virgin Mary, Purification of; Purification, feast of; sermon texts, Old Testament
_description: ‘In festo Purificacionis beate Marie’, followed by twenty-two lines, ‘De miraculis in purificacione’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Moyses thurgh god almightimade swilk lawes in þe Iewri…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And lend with him in lastand lightÞarto he graunt us grace & might
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Postquam impleti sunt dies purgacionis marie  cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: In festo Purificacionis beate marie Euangelium Secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 141ra)
